ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bizarre item on a merchant
ygData.msgSnippet: Hendi Mrubble in the Cleric s guild.  Make sure to use Carillion on her before handing her the ring, just to be safe.  She is on a different faction from the
ygData.messageBody:
Hendi Mrubble in the Cleric's guild. Make sure to use Carillion on her
before handing her the ring, just to be safe. She is on a different faction
from the Sheriff that gives out the ring.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Friday, October 13, 2000 9:56 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bizarre item on a merchant


who recharges the ring in rivervale?

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: October 13, 2000 11:41 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bizarre item on a merchant


It's been working fine on my Squad Ring. I discharge that thing pretty
often when I see newbies running towards guards.

Kit

I seem to recall there being an issue with charges displaying correctly on
a fully-discharged item. Was that fixed?

Talies
